page.title: 07CHRISTS HOSPITAL SCHOOL
page.content: FROM SEPTEMBER 1985 IT WILL HAVE 870 CHILDREN GIRLS AND BOYS THE AGE RANGES FROM 11/18 THERE ARE 85 TEACHERS THE CHILDREN COME FROM ALL OVER THERE ARE 50 CLASSES IT'S A BOARDING SCHOOL THEY START AT 9.00 ON A WEEK DAY. ON SATURDAY'S THEY START AT 8.30 THEY PLAY GAMES AND HOBBIES. THE UNIFORM IS A BLACK ROBE WHICH DATES FROM 1553 THE BOYS LIVE IN HOUSES, 50 BOYS TO A HOUSE. THEY HAVE 100 ACRES PLAY AREA WITH RUGGER, FOOTBALL AND CRICKET PITCHES. THEY WORK 3 TERMS A YEAR. THE HEADMASTER IS MR.D.BAKER. THE SCHOOL WAS FOUNDED IN 1553. THE SCHOOL WAS ORIGINALLY IN LONDON AND MOVED TO SUSSEX IN 1902 CHILDREN GO TO THE SCHOOL IF THEY PASS AN ENTRANCE EXAM,ARE INTRODUCED BY A GOVERNOR AND THEY PAY FEES ACCORDING TO A MEANS TEST. THE SCHOOL OWNS A FARM OF 1000 ACRES AROUND THE SCHOOL.
